verses.verse: אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim, These [be] the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh which Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, unto all Israel בְּעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; Jordan בַּמִּדְבָּ֡ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness בָּֽעֲרָבָה֩ <S%H6160><s%> ba-'a-ra-Vah in the plain מ֨וֹל <S%H4136><s%> Mol over against ס֜וּף <S%H5489><s%> suf the Red בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between פָּארָ֧ן <S%H6290><s%> pa-Ran [sea] between Paran וּבֵֽין־ <S%H996><s%> u-vein- between תֹּ֛פֶל <S%H8603><s%> To-fel and Tophel וְלָבָ֥ן <S%H3837><s%> ve-la-Van and Laban וַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת <S%H2698><s%> va-cha-tze-Rot and Hazeroth וְדִ֥י ve-Di זָהָֽב׃ <S%H1774><s%> za-Hav. and Dizahab

אַחַ֨ד <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad a עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> yOm days' מֵֽחֹרֵ֔ב <S%H2722><s%> me-cho-Rev, [journey] from Horeb דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- of mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir; Seir עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against קָדֵ֥שׁ ka-Desh בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <S%H6947><s%> bar-Ne-a'. to Kadesh-barnea

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בְּאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> be-'ar-ba-'Im And it came to pass in the fortieth שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> be-'ash-tei- eleven עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten חֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> Cho-desh month בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh [that] Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> Ke-chol to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah had given him in commandment יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh according unto all that the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem. about

אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei After הַכֹּת֗וֹ <S%H5221><s%> hak-ko-To, he had slain אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et סִיחֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> si-Chon Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> be-chesh-Bon; in Heshbon וְאֵ֗ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et, ע֚וֹג <S%H5747><s%> og and Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan, of Bashan אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev which dwelt בְּעַשְׁתָּרֹ֖ת <S%H6252><s%> be-'ash-ta-Rot at Astaroth בְּאֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <S%H154><s%> be-'ed-Re-'i. in Edrei

בְּעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver On this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av; of Moab הוֹאִ֣יל <S%H2974><s%> ho-'Il began מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses בֵּאֵ֛ר <S%H874><s%> be-'Er to declare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah this law הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu to us בְּחֹרֵ֣ב <S%H2722><s%> be-cho-Rev unto us in Horeb לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- long enough לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem שֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> She-vet Ye have dwelt בָּהָ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har in this mount הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

פְּנ֣וּ׀ <S%H6437><s%> pe-Nu Turn וּסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> u-se-'U you and take your journey לָכֶ֗ם la-Chem, וּבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> u-Vo-'u and go הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har to the mount הָֽאֱמֹרִי֮ <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שְׁכֵנָיו֒ <S%H7934><s%> she-che-Nav and unto all [the places] nigh בָּעֲרָבָ֥ה <S%H6160><s%> ba-'a-ra-Vah thereunto in the plain בָהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> va-Har in the hills וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֥ה <S%H8219><s%> u-vash-she-fe-Lah and in the vale וּבַנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> u-van-Ne-gev and in the south וּבְח֣וֹף <S%H2348><s%> u-ve-Chof side הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam; and by the sea אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz to the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni of the Canaanites וְהַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> ve-hal-le-va-Non, and unto Lebanon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far הַנָּהָ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har river הַגָּדֹ֖ל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol unto the great נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- the river פְּרָֽת׃ <S%H6578><s%> pe-Rat. Euphrates

רְאֵ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh Behold נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti I have set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land בֹּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> Bo-'u you go וּרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> u-re-Shu in and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' sware יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-Vo-tei-Chem unto your fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> u-le-ya-'a-Ko and Jacob לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, וּלְזַרְעָ֖ם <S%H2233><s%> u-le-zar-'Am unto them and to their seed אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar And I spake אֲלֵכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Chem, to you בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et unto you at that time הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- I am not אוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal I am not able לְבַדִּ֖י <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Di you myself alone שְׂאֵ֥ת <S%H5375><s%> se-'Et to bear אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God הִרְבָּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bah hath multiplied אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; וְהִנְּכֶ֣ם <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-ne-Chem and behold הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, you and behold ye [are] this day כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <S%H3556><s%> ke-choch-Vei as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heaven לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro. for multitude

יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh (The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֽוֹתֵכֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-te-Chem, of your fathers יֹסֵ֧ף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sef so many more as עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem and כָּכֶ֖ם ka-Chem אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef make you a thousand פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mim; times וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> vi-va-Rech ye [are] and bless אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber you as he hath promised לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

אֵיכָ֥ה <S%H349><s%> 'ei-Chah How אֶשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa can I myself alone bear לְבַדִּ֑י <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Di; alone טָרְחֲכֶ֥ם <S%H2960><s%> ta-re-cha-Chem your cumbrance וּמַֽשַּׂאֲכֶ֖ם <S%H4853><s%> u-mas-sa-'a-Chem and your burden וְרִֽיבְכֶֽם׃ <S%H7379><s%> ve-Ri-ve-Chem. adversary

הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> ha-Vu Take לָ֠כֶם La-chem אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim men חֲכָמִ֧ים <S%H2450><s%> cha-cha-Mim you wise וּנְבֹנִ֛ים <S%H995><s%> u-ne-vo-Nim and understanding וִידֻעִ֖ים <S%H3045><s%> vi-du-'Im and known לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7626><s%> le-shiv-tei-Chem; among your tribes וַאֲשִׂימֵ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> va-'a-si-Mem and I will make בְּרָאשֵׁיכֶֽם׃ <S%H7218><s%> be-ra-shei-Chem. them rulers

וַֽתַּעֲנ֖וּ <S%H6030><s%> vat-ta-'a-Nu And ye answered אֹתִ֑י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti; וַתֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vat-To-me-Ru, me and said טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> tov- [is] good הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var The thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ta which thou hast spoken לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot. [for us] to do

וָאֶקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> va-'ek-Kach So I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the chief שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H7626><s%> shiv-tei-Chem, of your tribes אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men חֲכָמִים֙ <S%H2450><s%> cha-cha-Mim wise וִֽידֻעִ֔ים <S%H3045><s%> vi-du-'Im, and known וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten and made אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam רָאשִׁ֖ים <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim them heads עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem; over שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei over you captains אֲלָפִ֜ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and captains מֵא֗וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot, over hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and captains חֲמִשִּׁים֙ <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim over fifties וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and captains עֲשָׂרֹ֔ת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rot, over tens וְשֹׁטְרִ֖ים <S%H7860><s%> ve-sho-te-Rim and officers לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H7626><s%> le-shiv-tei-Chem. among your tribes

וָאֲצַוֶּה֙ <S%H6680><s%> va-'a-tzav-Veh And I charged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֹׁ֣פְטֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8199><s%> sho-fe-tei-Chem, your judges בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et at that time הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying שָׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Mo-a' Hear בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Chem [the causes] between your brethren וּשְׁפַטְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8199><s%> u-she-fat-Tem and judge צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek, righteously בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish between [every] man וּבֵין־ <S%H996><s%> u-vein- between אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv and his brother וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between גֵּרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1616><s%> ge-Ro. and the stranger

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תַכִּ֨ירוּ <S%H5234><s%> tak-Ki-ru Ye shall not respect פָנִ֜ים <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nim persons בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> bam-mish-Pat, in judgment כַּקָּטֹ֤ן <S%H6996><s%> kak-ka-Ton the small כַּגָּדֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> kag-ga-Dol as well as the great תִּשְׁמָע֔וּן <S%H8085><s%> tish-ma-'Un, [but] ye shall hear לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תָג֙וּרוּ֙ <S%H1481><s%> ta-Gu-ru ye shall not be afraid מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei- of the face אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, of man כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-Pat for the judgment לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him [is] God's ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he וְהַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> ve-had-da-Var and the cause אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יִקְשֶׁ֣ה <S%H7185><s%> yik-Sheh that is too hard מִכֶּ֔ם <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem, is too תַּקְרִב֥וּן <S%H7126><s%> tak-ri-Vun for you bring אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me וּשְׁמַעְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H8085><s%> u-she-ma'-Tiv.
